reviews.review: just don't play the game if you don't want to smash your keyboard from frustration due to the huge number of hackers in the game

E' un ottimo fps tattico
Si basa interamente sul gameplay, le personalizzazioni sono buone e tutto sommato abbordabili nel Mercato
L'unico problema è che la curva di apprendimento è parecchio ripida, e il matchmaking non aiuta molto visto che vengo messo in game anche con chi è di innumerevoli ranghi superiore a me
Ma per il resto è tutto grasso che cola
Все бы было хорошо, если бы не было много софтин.
this game is good but 100% you rage this game bicause your tm is fucking russia
lot of hackers valve should improve their thing!
Jogo de merda o filho da puta do gaben devia meter o dinheiro q usa pra comprar merda no KFC pelo cu acima
this game is pure fun when playing with close friends.
In my opinion one of the best FPS multiplayer shooter of all times. Easy to learn but hard to handle..
to many hackers even in prime, but a good game
отличная игра но много читеров и шанс выподений ножа мал
Ein gutes shoter Spiel, welches man gut mit Freunden spielen kann. Wird aber schnell langweilig!
muito bom, espero que ganhe na categoria jogos feito com amor
Una de las cosas que le falta es mejorar el Matchmaking, es muy injusto a veces pero después de eso creo que es muy clave el CS
Even though my aim is terrible and most of the time I lose my games, I still enjoy the game. Silver 1 Forever.
Ah é um jogo muito bom, tirando os momentos de raiva e hate e muito bom jogar
Very very  very very realistic.u will nevevget bored cause of the huge variety of maps and game modes

Игра хорошая веселая,но порой она так бесит что хочется расхуярить монитор и выкинуть комп в окно!
 Удачи новечки,так как тут вам пиздец,читеров дохуя!

Video games are supposed to be fun. They are a great way to pass the time and entertain your self, giving you a small break from your everyday life and struggles.
This game is exactly the opposite. This game is not fun. This game is tiring. You take breaks for this game. THIS is your everyday struggle.
And I love it.
And you should too.
Fuck the cheaters
not worth 1000 hours but it ok
Good game. The community is surprisingly non-toxic for a competitive shooter
